page.title: 17Religion in Morwenstow
page.content: There is only one place of worship in this block, this being Woodford Methodist Church which is situated in square 2113. The present building was opened on 23rd March 1883. The cost of building the church was Â£300. There is a church service every Sunday with additional services at the various religious festivals i.e. Christmas and Easter. The average congregation has decreased over the years with the average congregation at the present time being only 10-15. This number rises at Christmas and Easter and also when the Sunday school holds its anniversary services. The Sunday school is for children between the ages of 3 and 11. The numbers attending Sunday school has also declined over the years with there being 10 children on the roll at the present time.
